temples.history:
Site Dedication:  1 June 1915 by Joseph F. Smith
        Announcement:  3 October 1915
        Groundbreaking:  8 February 1916
        Dedication:  27 to 30 November 1919 by Heber J. Grant
        Public Open House:  2 to 27 May 1978
        Rededication:  13 to 15 June 1978 by Spencer W. Kimball
        Public Open House:  22 October to 13 November 2010
        Rededication:  21 November 2010 by Thomas S. Monson
